amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that Tech-Prep activities are held harmless with respect to the amount that was appropriated for the Tech-Prep program in fiscal year 2005.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-69 to provide that funding for Tech-Prep activities are held harmless to the amount that was appropriated to the Tech-Prep in FY05 in order to reinforce the consolidation of the Tech-Prep program with the Basic State Grant program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castle amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
